casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Arthur L. HOYLE, a/k/a Skinnyman Hoyle, and Arthur Hoyle, Defendant-Petitioner. C-1047 September Term 2017
080741 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 20, 2018

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION.

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000116-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
